infos.value: A simple glance is all I need to tell if you're being sincere or not.
You have to understand. If you keep acting like that—
Our mission is to assassinate Lord Da—I mean Dario, right?
But the Hourne soldiers, why them...?
Besides...until just now, we got along well and talked together as allies...
Is that all you want to say?
Once this mission is over, you're going back to the Serpent's Den for further training.
We'll meet up with Vinera there...and take out Dario!
